name: comatose
caption: Comatose

effect.short: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.
effect.full: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by []{move:yawn}; it can use []{move:sleep-talk}; and so on.

flavorText:
It’s always drowsing and will never wake up.
It can attack without waking up.
